# Portfolio Website - Next.js Project

## Project Overview
Professional portfolio website for showcasing web design skills, built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

## Setup Status
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffold Next.js project structure
- [x] Customize with portfolio content
- [x] Install dependencies and compile
- [x] Launch development server

## Development
- Local: http://localhost:3000
- The dev server is running in the background

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 15 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- React

## Features
- About Me section
- Skills showcase
- Projects portfolio
- Contact form
- Responsive design
- SSG for optimal performance
